comment: Very fun teacher and clearly passionate. Dr. T-Lee is amazing and truly wants students to succeed. There are 3 teaching assignments, a final based on playing the recorder, random quizzes, a vocab midterm and a music education project, all of which are very easy and she guides you. Very fun class and gets you way out of your comfort zone!

She is very bubbly and out going. She teaches the class like a real elementary school music room so there is singing, dancing, and playing instruments. There are 3 teaching presentations (one as a group) and a mid term.

Dr. T-Lee is a delightful teacher. I was nervous about this class because it is an Elementary Music Education class- there was singing, dancing, and chanting rhymes. We also got to play instruments. She was very clear about her expectations and I 100% recommend taking her class. It was a joy to learn.
